title: The crown of righteousness. Set forth in a sermon preached at Stephens Walbrook, May 1. 1656. At the funeral of Thomas Hodges Esquire. / By Thomas Watson, minister of Stephens Walbrook, in the citie of London.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Joseph Crawford, at the signe of the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard,
